WITH TBL AS (select address from (SELECT address FROM NAVER_REAL_ESTATE WHERE ATCLNO = '${atclNo}') where ROWNUM = 1), JEONSE AS (SELECT PRC FROM (SELECT * FROM NAVER_REAL_ESTATE WHERE ADDRESS = (select address from tbl) AND TRADTPNM = '전세' ORDER BY PRC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1), MAEMAE AS (SELECT PRC FROM (SELECT * FROM NAVER_REAL_ESTATE WHERE ADDRESS = (select address from tbl) AND TRADTPNM = '매매' ORDER BY PRC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) SELECT (SELECT PRC FROM JEONSE) as jeonse_price, (SELECT PRC FROM MAEMAE) as maemae_price, TO_CHAR( (SELECT PRC FROM JEONSE) / (SELECT PRC FROM MAEMAE) * 100, 'FM99999999') as rate FROM DUAL
